name: Clash Dash
description:
Clash Dash is multiplayer mobile game which gives the player ability to control a humanoid character prompted by an unexpected sequence of events to embark on an adventure of racing with other players through maps. By racing, player earns coins and buys himself varius clothing pieces.  

The game is still in development and you can try out our free demo which includes first chapter of the game. First chapter (tutorial level) is primarily focused on player's learning, the mechanics of movement, jumping and interaction with objects.

Control Sheme

Joystick on bottom left side

Two buttons on bottom right side
